title: Font name and how to get it (free)
content:
Hi everyone! I’m Marchese, and I’m an Italian 27 year old. I work for a bank. First, please forgive mne for not speaking a good English. Then, please try to help me. I’m looking for a font, but I don’t know its name. You can see it in attached image.  
Do you know it? Can you help me finding it and downloading it (free)?

Thank you vey much, I hope you can help me.

Marchese

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123030720im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Barberis_6418.JPG)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Barberis.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123030720/http:/typophile.com/files/Barberis.JPG) | 6.48 KB |

author: Marchese

comments.content:
Since you work for a bank, can you help me find some money for free?  
:^)
Richard, your answer resembeled perfection. No wait, it **was** perfection.
